summary: Generate Doxygen comments from user defined templates
name: doxygen-support.vim
description:
This plugin generates Ex commands and a menu (or a menu tree) from a template
file containing user defined comment templates to be used for source code
documentation with Doxygen. The template file can have user defined macros.

Example and screen shots :   http://lug.fh-swf.de/vim/vim-doxygen/index.html

The help file online :   http://lug.fh-swf.de/vim/vim-doc/doxygensupport.html

Documentation
--------------------------------------------------------
This plugin comes with a help file (doxygensupport.txt). Read it with  

  :h doxygensupport


MAILING LIST
--------------------------------------------------------
You can subscribe to the vim-plugins-list mailing list to post your questions or
suggestions for improvement or to report bugs.  The list will also be used to
announce new releases ( c.vim / bash-support / perl-support / doxgen-support ).
Visit the following page for subscribing to the mailing list:
     
  http://lug.fh-swf.de/cgi-bin/mailman/listinfo/vim-plugins-list

The vim-plugins-list list is very low on traffic.

_______________________
Thank you for rating doxygen-support !
install_details:
(1) Copy the zip archive  doxygen-support.zip to $HOME/.vim/ or $VIM/vimfiles
    (on the Windows platforms) and run

      unzip doxygen-support.zip

    If you have already an older version of doxygen-support and you have modified
    the template files you may want to save your templates first or copy the 
    files from the archive by hand.

(2) Loading of plugin files must be enabled. If not use
      :filetype plugin on
    This is the minimal content of the file '$HOME/.vimrc'. Create one if there
    is none. 

(3) Set at least some personal details in the main file 
    'doxygen-support/templates/doxygen.templates'. 

(4) Restart gVim/Vim generate the help tags 

      :helptags ~/.vim/doc

    and look at the doxygensupport help with

      :h doxygensupport

  For a system-wide installation please see the help file 'doc/doxygensupport.txt'.

versions.release_notes:
- New main menu iten: "help (Doxygen-Support)"
- Bugfix: detection of a systemwide installation can fail.

- Completely new doxygen integration.
- New ex-commands.

- Windows: Missing variable from 2.0.1 was still wrong.
- Bugfix: variable g:Doxy_LoadMenus had no effect.
- Documentation corrected.

- Windows: Missing variable prevents correct plugin loading (thanks to Martin Banszel)
- Documentation corrected.

- Systemwide installation now possible.
- Visual mode insert (surround a marked region).
- Dialog to ask for parameters possible.
- Automatic generation of submenu titles.
- Templates now can contain preprocessor statements.

- Include mechanism for template files.
- Menu items can be sorted/unsorted.
- New template attributes allow insertion above and below the current line and appending to the current line.
